commentBody: On 8-5-2006 being a Detroit Tigers fan from northern Michigan I took my father to a Tigers game for his birthday also the same day. I'll never forget him being a frugile person who worked in a limestone quarry for 38 years and having two back surgeries jogging down the street and high fiving strangers at 60 years old after Ivan Pudge Rodriguez hit a game winning home run with two outs over your fathers Indians. Lol. Go blue. Great Article also. Brought back some sweet memories.
